creator: rmager@vgkk.com
text:
We want to run JMeter on some servlets that are running on port 8080 (not the
normal 80), it appears this can't be configured right now. I put this priority
to high because there currently is no workaround (aside from editing the source
code ;-).

creator: bburns@apache.org
text: This is now fixed in CVS.

Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
jsalvata@atg.com
text: Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
